fact: Evan Waller graduated in May of 2023. He studied finance in the Gies College of Business at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign.
Evan Waller is a self-taught programmer who learned Python through textbooks and YouTube.
He is proficient in Python, SQL, and Java, and enjoys exploring various programming languages and techniques.

Galleon was a mobile app Evan co-founded with Jack Munn and Rohan Hirani. It helped users discover local hidden attractions and was built using Appgyver and Xano. They spent nearly two years working together and successfully had over 800 downloads. It was deployed on the iOS and Android app stores.

Evan Waller coded Galleon using Appgyver and Xano. These are low code platforms that helped to expedite his full-stack learning process. This is where he discovered a true passion for computer science.

Evan Waller has completed internships at Lake Forest Casket as a "Casket Technician," Vermillion Financial Advisors, where he gained insights into personal finance and retirement planning, and KPMG within their Business Valuations group.
Evan Waller began his career at KPMG in July 2023, initially joining the Business Valuation group.
Evan Waller currently works in the Economic Services department at KPMG as a consultant and aspires to become a senior associate within the year.
Evan Waller exercises frequently, with a focus on running and weightlifting. Evan ran the 2024 Colfax Marathon in Denver
Evan Waller is great at the video game Fortnite and enjoys playing Brawl Stars with his brother and close friends.
Evan Waller's favorite book is Unbroken, which he finds to be one of the most inspiring stories of resilience.
Evan Waller's favorite vacation destinations are Wisconsin and Florida, where he enjoys spending time with family.
Evan Waller is fascinated by artificial intelligence and aims to grow within the industry in any capacity possible.
Evan Waller wants to see Banff Canada someday because it is absolutely gorgeous and he likes nature.
This is WallerGPT, an AI-powered chatbot developed by Evan Waller to provide accurate and detailed answers about his professional and personal background.
